mapper.select:
SELECT SUBSTR(A.AUC_DT, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.AUC_DT, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.AUC_DT, 7, 2) AS AUC_DT /* 경매일자 */ , CASE WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '1' THEN '송아지' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '2' THEN '비육우' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '3' THEN '번식우' ELSE '일괄' END AS AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분코드 */ , D.FHS_ID_NO || '-' || D.FARM_AMNNO AS FHS_ID_NO /* 출하자코드 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN D.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) = 5 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,5,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) > 5 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,5,1) ELSE '**' END AS FTSNM /* 출하자명 */ , CASE WHEN LENGTH(D.BIRTH) = 8 THEN SUBSTR(D.BIRTH, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(D.BIRTH, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(D.BIRTH, 7, 2) ELSE '-' END AS FHS_BIRTH , CASE WHEN D.MACO_YN = '1' THEN '조합원' ELSE '비조합원' END AS MACO_YN /* 조합원여부 */ , CASE WHEN D.JRDWO_DSC = '1' THEN '관내' ELSE '관외' END AS JRDWO_DSC /* 관내외구분 */ , A.AUC_PRG_SQ AS AUC_PRG_SQ /* 경매진행순서 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN D.DONGUP ||' '|| D.DONGBW ELSE D.DONGUP ||' '|| TRIM(LPAD(' ', LENGTH(D.DONGBW) +1, '*')) END AS DONGUP /* 주소 */ , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 축산개체관리번호 */ , CASE WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '0' THEN '없음' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN '암' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '2' THEN '수' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '3' THEN '거세' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '4' THEN '미경산' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '5' THEN '비거세' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '6' THEN '프리마틴' WHEN C.INDV_SEX_C = '9' THEN '공통' ELSE '없음' END AS INDV_SEX_C /* 개체성별코드 */ , SUBSTR(C.BIRTH, 1, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(C.BIRTH, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(C.BIRTH, 7, 2) AS BIRTH , SUBSTR(C.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(C.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(C.MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO /* 어미소축산개체관리번호 */ , nvl(A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM, 0) AS LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM /* 최저낙찰한도금액 */ , nvl(A.COW_SOG_WT, 0) AS COW_SOG_WT /* 우출하중량 */ , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN nvl(A.SRA_SBID_UPR, 0) ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_UPR /* 낙찰단가 */ , CASE WHEN A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN nvl(A.SRA_SBID_AM, 0) ELSE 0 END AS SRA_SBID_AM /* 낙찰금액 */ , nvl(B.SRA_SOG_FEE, 0) AS SRA_SOG_FEE /* 출하수수료 */ , (nvl(B.SRA_ACO_IVSAM, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0)) AS SRA_PYIVA /* 조합출자금 */ , nvl(B.SRA_ACD_RVGAM, 0) AS SRA_ACD_RVGAM /* 사고적립금 */ , (nvl(B.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS, 0)) AS SRA_TRPCS /* 운송비 */ , nvl(B.SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE, 0) AS SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE /* 괴사감정료 */ , nvl(B.SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE, 0) AS SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE /* 임신감정료 */ , nvl(B.SRA_MDCCS, 0) AS SRA_MDCCS /* 검진비 */ , nvl(B.SRA_INJT_FEE, 0) AS SRA_INJT_FEE /* 주사료 */ , nvl(B.SRA_SHNM, 0) AS SRA_SHNM /* 자조금 */ , nvl(B.SRA_PDG_RC_FEE, 0) AS SRA_PDG_RC_FEE /* 혈통접수비 */ , nvl(B.SRA_RMHN_FEE, 0) AS SRA_RMHN_FEE /* 제각수수료 */ , nvl(B.SRA_TRU_FEE , 0) AS SRA_TRU_FEE /* 위탁수수료 */ , nvl(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) AS SRA_FED_SPY_AM /* 사료공급금액 */ , nvl(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) AS TD_RC_CST /* 당일접수비용 */ , nvl(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0) AS MT12_OVR_FEE /* 12개월이상수수료 */ , nvl(NVL(A.SRA_SBID_AM , 0)- (NVL(B.SRA_SOG_FEE, 0) + (nvl(B.SRA_ACO_IVSAM, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_PYIVA, 0)) + NVL(B.SRA_ACD_RVGAM, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TRPCS, 0) + NVL(A.SRA_TRPCS , 0) + NVL(B.SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_MDCCS, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_INJT_FEE , 0) + NVL(B.SRA_SHNM, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_PDG_RC_FEE, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_RMHN_FEE, 0) + NVL(B.SRA_TRU_FEE , 0) + NVL(A.SRA_FED_SPY_AM, 0) + NVL(A.TD_RC_CST, 0) + NVL(A.MT12_OVR_FEE, 0)), 0) AS TOT_AM /* 정산금액 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM WHEN LENGTH(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) = 5 THEN SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,5,1) WHEN LENGTH(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM) > 5 THEN SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(E.VHC_DRV_CAFFNM,5,1) ELSE '**' END AS VHC_DRV_CAFFNM /* 수송자명 */ , CASE WHEN A.DNA_YN_CHK = '1' THEN '여' ELSE '부' END AS DNA_YN_CHK /* 친자검사여부 */ , CASE WHEN A.DNA_YN_CHK = '1' THEN '일치' WHEN A.DNA_YN = '2' THEN '불일치' ELSE '미확인' END AS DNA_YN /* 친자검사결과 */ , A.RMK_CNTN AS RMK_CNTN /* 비고내용*/ , CASE WHEN A.PRNY_JUG_YN = '1' THEN '여' ELSE '부' END AS PRNY_JUG_YN /* 임신감정여부 */ , CASE WHEN A.PRNY_YN = '1' THEN '여' ELSE '부' END AS PRNY_YN /* 임신여부 */ , CASE WHEN D.SRA_FED_SPY_YN = '1' THEN '여' ELSE '부' END AS SRA_FED_SPY_YN /* 사료미사용여부 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN G.FTSNM WHEN LENGTH(G.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(G.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(G.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(G.FTSNM) = 5 THEN SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,5,1) WHEN LENGTH(G.FTSNM) > 5 THEN SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(G.FTSNM,5,1) ELSE '**' END AS ACNO_OWNER /* 예금주 */ , CASE WHEN A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN D.SRA_FARM_ACNO = '' OR D.SRA_FARM_ACNO IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN #{ss_security} != '1' THEN SUBSTR(D.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,3) || TRIM(LPAD(' ', LENGTH(SUBSTR(D.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,4,20)) +1, '*')) ELSE D.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO END) ELSE (CASE WHEN #{ss_security} != '1' THEN SUBSTR(D.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,3) || TRIM(LPAD(' ', LENGTH(SUBSTR(D.SRA_FARM_ACNO,4,20)) +1, '*')) ELSE D.SRA_FARM_ACNO END) END) ELSE (CASE WHEN G.SRA_FARM_ACNO = '' OR G.SRA_FARM_ACNO IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN #{ss_security} != '1' THEN SUBSTR(D.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,3) || TRIM(LPAD(' ', LENGTH(SUBSTR(D.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO,4,20)) +1, '*')) ELSE D.NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO END) ELSE (CASE WHEN #{ss_security} != '1' THEN SUBSTR(D.SRA_FARM_ACNO,1,3) || TRIM(LPAD(' ', LENGTH(SUBSTR(D.SRA_FARM_ACNO,4,20)) +1, '*')) ELSE D.SRA_FARM_ACNO END) END) END AS SRA_FARM_ACNO /* 계좌번호 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN D.OHSE_TELNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-','')) IN(11,12) THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.OHSE_TELNO,'-',''),8,4) END AS OHSE_TELNO /* 출하주 전화번호 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN D.CUS_MPNO WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) IN(11,12) THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO /* 출하주 핸드폰번호 */
, A.RMHN_YN /* 제각여부 */ , CASE WHEN #{ss_security} = '1' THEN F.SRA_MWMNNM ELSE SUBSTR(F.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || LPAD('*',LENGTH(F.SRA_MWMNNM)-2, '*') || SUBSTR(F.SRA_MWMNNM, LENGTH(F.SRA_MWMNNM), 1) END SRA_MWMNNM , CASE WHEN TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.AUC_DT, D.BIRTH)) +1 <= 4 AND A.NA_BZPLC NOT IN ('8808990656199', '8808990656434') THEN 4 ELSE TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(A.AUC_DT, C.BIRTH)) +1 END AS MTCN FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , (SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '010' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SOG_FEE /* 출하수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '011' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SEL_FEE /* 판매수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '020' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ACO_IVSAM /* 조합출자금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '030' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_ACD_RVGAM /* 사고적립금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '040' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRPCS /* 운송비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '050' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_NCSS_JUG_FEE /* 괴사감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '060' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PRNY_JUG_FEE /* 임신감정료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '070' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_MDCCS /* 검진비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '080' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_INJT_FEE /* 주사료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '090' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_SHNM /* 자조금 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '100' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_PDG_RC_FEE /* 혈통접수비 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '110' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_RMHN_FEE /* 제각수수료 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN NA_FEE_C = '120' THEN (CASE WHEN ANS_DSC = '1' THEN 1 ELSE -1 END) * SRA_TR_FEE ELSE 0 END) AS SRA_TRU_FEE /* 위탁수수료 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_FEE_IMPS WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ AND AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} END AND AUC_DT BETWEEN #{auc_st_dt} AND #{auc_ed_dt} /* 경매일자 */ AND FEE_APL_OBJ_C = '1' /* 1.출하자 2.낙찰자 */ GROUP BY NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO ) B , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV C , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS D , TB_LA_IS_MM_VHC E , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS G , TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN F WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} /* 경제통합사업장코드 */ AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT BETWEEN #{auc_st_dt} AND #{auc_ed_dt} /* 경매일자 */ AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM > 0 AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = B.AUC_OBJ_DSC AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT AND A.OSLP_NO = B.OSLP_NO AND A.LED_SQNO = B.LED_SQNO AND A.NA_BZPLC = C.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = C.SRA_SRS_DSC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = C.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.NA_BZPLC = D.NA_BZPLC AND A.FHS_ID_NO = D.FHS_ID_NO AND A.FARM_AMNNO = D.FARM_AMNNO AND A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC(+) AND A.VHC_SHRT_C = E.VHC_SHRT_C(+) AND A.NA_BZPLC = F.NA_BZPLC(+) AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = F.TRMN_AMNNO(+) AND A.NA_BZPLC = G.NA_BZPLC AND CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN A.FHS_ID_NO ELSE A.SOGMN_C END = G.FHS_ID_NO AND (CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN A.FARM_AMNNO ELSE 0 END) = (CASE WHEN (A.SOGMN_C = '' OR A.SOGMN_C IS NULL) THEN G.FARM_AMNNO ELSE 0 END) AND (D.FHS_ID_NO = #{fhs_id_no} OR #{fhs_id_no} IS NULL) AND (D.FTSNM = #{ftsnm} OR #{ftsnm} IS NULL) AND (D.jrdwo_dsc = #{v_jrdwo_dsc} OR #{v_jrdwo_dsc} IS NULL) ORDER BY A.AUC_DT, A.AUC_OBJ_DSC, D.FHS_ID_NO, A.AUC_PRG_SQ
